pkgmetadata.longdescription: With a small codebase, the PowerDNS Recursor is an advanced recursor currently serving the DNS resolving needs of over 2 million Internet connections. Besides high performance (using kqueue or epoll, over 15 thousand qps on commodity hardware), it provides advanced anti-spoofing measures. In addition, the program caches server performance and timeouts, making it both network and user friendly. It also has built-in hooks for making graphs with rrdtool, providing insight into nameserver performance.
